Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content:
Here you get an overview on Java Beans you can use in JSPs. We show EL expressions, that provide you with an object of the beans.

The overview is not meant to be complete, but provides a good reference if you look for access a certain OpenCms specific information in your JSP.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: Get an overview on Java beans used in EL and their purpose. Follow direct links to the according JavaDoc of the beans.

AlkaconDocumentationTopicFrame.Keywords: OpenCms, overview, EL, expression language, JSP, Java beans

LinkDescription.name: LinkDescription0
LinkDescription.content: While here we just list the interesting Java beans, under this link, you find the interesting properties of many beans.

Link.LinkText: General overview on how to use OpenCms functionality in JSPs.
